properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu raaju neetitho doshamemiyu lekaye Paapa rahithudu prabhu vachchu chunde{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshana gala vaadugaa akshayundagu yesudu Deeksha thoda yerooshalem vachchu chunde{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Saatwikundu ee bhuvin atyantha magu prematho Nitya raaju narulakai vachchu chunde{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deena parudu nee prabhu ghanatha kaligina devudu Praana meeya paapulakai vachchu chunde{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}IIanu gaadida nekkiye baalura stotramulatho Baludagu nee prabhu vachchu chude{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daaveedu kumaarudu devudu paapulaku Jaya geetamulatho vachchu chunde{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuni preminchuchu Hosannaaa paadedamu Yesu dila vachchu chunde Halleluyaa{/lang-eng}
